> What should be done to increase "camera01" far clip value? Is this Sigma Dimensions issue then?

It is a general issue when celestial bodies are rescaled (usually upwards). The stock KSP camera values are good enough for stock but not for custom planetary systems.  

Camera clip values must be set via a plugin. Not sure about Sigma Dimensions but <abbr title="Real Solar System (mod)">RSS</abbr> (~10X rescale compared to stock) has provisions for setting these camera values for that reason.
